description: AI assisted commit message generation. Never suffer through writing commit messages again.
configuration.title: Git Commit Genie
category.title: Git Commit Genie
views.activitybar.title: Git Commit Genie
command.toggleChain: Git Commit Genie: Toggle thinking mode
config.autoStageAllForDiff.desc: Only when the staging area is empty: temporarily stage all changes to build the diff, then restore your staging state. Use with caution—this may include unrelated changes in the prompt.
config.chain.enabled.desc: Enable multi-step chain prompting for commit generation (It makes the generated commit messages more detailed and accurate, and better aligns with the user's template, but it will increase latency and token consumption).
config.chain.maxParallelNew.desc: Maximum parallel LLM calls used by chain prompting across all providers. Increase carefully to avoid provider rate limits.
config.workspaceFiles.enabled.desc: Include a compact list of workspace filenames in the prompt. You can disable this if prompts get too large.
config.workspaceFiles.maxFiles.desc: Maximum number of filenames to send. If the number exceeds this limit, the list is hard-truncated.
config.workspaceFiles.excludePatterns.de: Additional gitignore-style patterns to exclude from the filename list.
config.commitLanguage.desc: Target language for generated commit messages.
templates.chooseLocation: Choose where to save the template
templates.renameExists: A template with that name already exists.
